channel.title: Could anybody help me please {PI}
channel.description:
hi im using a PI source.
im trying to fix the trade problem. the problem is if i trade somebody it comes up on there screen **** wants to trade with you . then they accept it and then it comes up on my screen saying they wish to trade with me.
its a constant loop and we never get to the trade screen...
i have looked in the tutorial sections and havnt found this problem.
any1 know the answer. thanks

item.title: Could anybody help me please {PI}
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Check the trade interface stuff, or edit it so when you click accept trade the trade interface pops up for both. Idk summin like that.

Read full topic
